Type Registrar

Namespace Machine.Fakes

Registration endpoint for configuring the underlying container with concrete implementations (the rest that can be faked will be filled up from the AutoFakeContainer).

Methods

  • For
  • For<T>
  • New

Public instance methods

RegistrationExpression For(Type type)

Starts the configuration of a type. This should be the interface type.
Parameters
Type type

Specifies the interface type.

Return
RegistrationExpression

An expression for further configuration.

RegistrationExpression`1 For<T>()

Starts the configuration of a type. This should be the interface type.
Return
RegistrationExpression`1

An expression for further configuration.

Public static methods

Registrar New(Action<Registrar> configurationExpression)

Shortcut for inlining the configuration of a registrar via the nested closure pattern.
Parameters
Action<Registrar> configurationExpression

Specifies the expression that does the configuraition.

Return
Registrar

The configured registrar.
